summary:
- **2Q25 Sales Performance**:  
  - Total sales: **402** (222 new sales, 180 resales), highest quarterly sales ever.  
  - **1H25 total sales**: **692** (up 18% YoY vs. 1H24).  
  - **Regional diversification**: 46.7% of sales from outside Auckland/Wellington/Christchurch.  
  - **St Johns village**: 50% of apartments and 60% of memory care units delivered in late 2024 now contracted/occupied (ahead of internal targets).  

- **FY25 Guidance**: On track to deliver **650–730 homes**, including new village centers in Cambridge (NZ) and Cranbourne North (Australia), and first villas at Chirnside Park (Australia).  

- **HY25 Results**: Scheduled for release on **28 August 2025**.  

*(No capital-raising, liquidity, or valuation-impacting material disclosed. Operational metrics only.)*
